name: sql92-json
description: can stringify a JSON into an SQL and viceversa parse an SQL and serialize it into a JSON

scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; git push origin master
